titles.title: Commercial Flight Courtesy Act
A bill to amend title 49, United States Code, to prohibit voice communications through mobile communication devices on commercial passenger flights.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Commerce, Science, and Transportation.

bill.summary: 12/12/2013--Introduced. Commercial Flight Courtesy Act - Prohibits an individual, with specified exceptions, from engaging in voice communications through a mobile communication device while onboard a domestic passenger aircraft.
